price: ߕߎ߬ߡߊ߬ߘߐ߫ ߌ ߦߴߌ ߖߘߍ߬ ߣߌ ߕߌߢߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߯ ߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫߹
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
